para.text: There are two types of data specified on this pane:
When a boundary condition is used to represent a flux through the edge of the model

For example, you might use the well package on the edge of the model domain to represent a constant flux boundary at the edge of the model. There are several choices and the diagram next to the choices illustrates how they apply.
